Beffymaroo already has her arms full with feathered fluffballs. “Maybe they'll help us rebuild the damaged areas of Habitica!”

Crooning and singing, the Hippogriffs lead the way as all the Habitcans work together to restore our beloved home.
questDysheartenerBossRageDescription: The Rage Attack gauge fills when Habiticans miss their Dailies. If it fills up, the Dysheartener will unleash its Shattering Heartbreak attack on one of Habitica's shopkeepers, so be sure to do your tasks!
questDysheartenerBossRageSeasonal:
`The Dysheartener uses SHATTERING HEARTBREAK!`

Oh, no! After feasting on our undone Dailies, the Dysheartener has gained the strength to unleash its Shattering Heartbreak attack. With a shrill shriek, it brings its spiny forelegs down upon the pavilion that houses the Seasonal Shop! The concussive blast of magic shreds the wood, and the Seasonal Sorceress is overcome by sorrow at the sight.

Quickly, let's keep doing our Dailies so that the beast won't strike again!
seasonalShopRageStrikeRecap: On February 21, our belov'd Leslie th' Seas'nal Sorc'ress was devastat'd when th' Dysheartener shatter'd th' Seas'nal Shop. Quickly, tackle yer tasks t' defeat th' monster an' help rebuild!
marketRageStrikeRecap: On February 28, our marv'lous Alex th' Merchant was horrifi'd when th' Dysheartener shatter'd th' Market. Quickly, tackle yer tasks t' defeat th' monster an' help rebuild!
questsRageStrikeRecap: On March 6, our wond'rful Ian th' Adventure Guide was deeply shaken when th' Dysheartener shatter'd th' ground around th' Adventure Shop. Quickly, tackle yer tasks t' defeat th' monster an' help rebuild!
questDysheartenerBossRageMarket:
`Th' Dysheartener uses SHATTERING HEARTBREAK!`

Help! Aft feastin' on our incomplete Dailies, th' Dysheartener lets out another Shatterin' Heartbreak attack, smashin' th' walls 'n floor o' th' Market! As stone rains down, Alex th' Merchant weeps at his crushed merchandise, stricken by th' destruction.

We can nah let this happen again! Be sure t' do all our yer Dailies t' prevent th' Dysheartener from usin' its final strike.
questDysheartenerBossRageQuests:
`Th' Dysheartener uses SHATTERING HEARTBREAK!`

Aaaah! We've left our Dailies undone again, 'n th' Dysheartener has mustered th' energy fer one final blow against our beloved shopkeepers. Th' countryside around Ian th' Adventure Master be ripped apart by its Shatterin' Heartbreak attack, 'n Ian be struck t' th' core by th' horrific vision. We be so close t' defeatin' this monster.... Hurry! Don't stop now!
hugabugNotes: Contains 'The CRITICAL BUG,' 'The Snail of Drudgery Sludge,' and 'Bye, Bye, Butterfry.' Available until March 31.
questSquirrelNotes:
Ye wake up 'n find ye've o'erslept! Why didn't yer alarm go off? ... How did an acorn get stuck in th' ringer?

When ye try t' make grub, th' toaster be stuffed wit' acorns. When ye go t' loot yer mount, @Shtut be thar, tryin' unsuccessfully t' unlock thar stable. They look into th' keyhole. "Be that an acorn in thar?"

@randomdaisy cries out, "Oh no! I knew me pet squirr'ls had gotten out, but I didn't know they'd made such trouble! Can ye help me round them up afore they make any more o' a mess?"

Followin' th' trail o' mischievously placed oak nuts, ye track 'n catch th' wayward sciurines, wit' @Cantras helpin' secure each one safely at ship. But jus' when ye reckon yer task be nigh-on complete, an acorn bounces off yer helm! Ye look up t' see a mighty beast o' a squirr'l, crouched in defense o' a prodigious pile o' seeds.

"Oh dear," says @randomdaisy, softly. "She's always been somethin' o' a resource guarder. We'll 'ave t' proceed mighty carefully!" Ye circle up wit' yer party, ready fer trouble!
questSquirrelCompletion: With a gentle approach, offers of trade, and a few soothing spells, you’re able to coax the squirr'l away from its hoard and back to the stables, which @Shtut has just finished de-acorning. They've set aside a few of the acorns on a worktable. "These ones are squirr'l eggs! Maybe you can raise some that don't play with their food quite so much."
questSquirrelUnlockText: Unlocks Squirr'l Eggs fer purchase in th' Market
cuddleBuddiesNotes: Contains 'The Killer Bunny', 'The Nefarious Ferret', and 'The Guinea Pig Gang'. Available until May 31.
aquaticAmigosNotes: Contains 'Th' Magical Axolotl', 'Th' Kraken o' Inkomplete', an' 'Th' Call o' Octothulu'. Available 'til August 31.
questSeaSerpentText: iDanger in th' Depths: Sea Serp'nt Strike!
questSeaSerpentNotes:
Yer streaks 'ave ye feelin' lucky - it's th' perfect time fer a trip t' th' seahorse racetrack. Ye board th' submarine at Diligent Docks 'n settle in fer th' trip t' Dilatory, but yeâve barely submerged when an impact rocks th' sub, sendin' its occupants tumblin'. "Wha's goin' on?" @AriesFaries shouts.

Ye glance through a nearby porthole 'n are shocked by th' wall o' shimmerin' scales passin' by it. "Sea serp'nt!" Captain @Witticaster calls through th' intercom. "Brace yourselves, it's comin' 'round again!" As ye grip th' arms o' yer seat, yer unfinished tasks flash afore yer eyes. "Maybe if we work together 'n complete them, ye reckon, we can drive this monster away!"
questSeaSerpentCompletion: Battered by yer commitment, th' sea serpent flees, disappearin' into th' depths. When ye arrive in Dilatory, ye breathe a sigh o' relief afore noticin' @*~Seraphina~ approachin' wit' three translucent eggs cradled in her arms. "Here, ye should 'ave these," she says. "Ye know how t' handle a sea serpent!" As ye accept th' eggs, ye vow anew t' remain steadfast in completin' yer tasks t' ensure that thar's nah a repeat occurrence.
questSeaSerpentUnlockText: Unlocks Sea Serp'nt Eggs fer purchase in th' Market
questKangarooNotes:
Maybe ye should 'ave finished that last taskâ¦ ye know, th' one ye keep avoidin', even though it always comes back around? But @Mewrose 'n @LilithofAlfheim invited ye 'n @stefalupagus t' see a rare kang'roo troop hoppin' through th' Sloensteadi Savannah; how could ye say no?! As th' troop comes into view, somethin' hits ye on aft o' th' head wit' a mighty whack!

Shakin' th' stars from yer vision, ye pick up th' responsible object--a dark red boomerang, wit' th' mighty task ye continually push back etched into its surface. A quick glance around confirms th' rest o' yer party met a similar fate. One larger kang'roo looks at ye wit' a smug grin, like sheâs darin' ye t' face her 'n that dreaded task once 'n fer all!
questKangarooCompletion:
"NOW!" Ye signal yer party t' throw th' boomerangs back at th' kang'roo. Th' beast hops further away wit' each hit 'til she flees, leavin' naught more than a dark red cloud o' dust, a few eggs, 'n some gold doubloons.

@Mewrose walks fore t' where th' kang'roo once stood. "Ahoy, where did th' boomerangs go?"

"They prolly dissolved into dust, makin' that dark red cloud, when we finished our respective tasks," @stefalupagus speculates.

@LilithofAlfheim squints at th' horizon. "Be that another kang'roo troop headin' our way?"

Ye all break into a run back t' Habit City. Better t' face yer difficult tasks than loot another lump t' aft o' th' head!
questKangarooUnlockText: Unlocks Kang'roo Eggs fer purchase in th' Market
forestFriendsNotes: Contains 'The Spirit of Spring', 'The Hedgebeast', and 'The Tangle Tree'. Available until September 30.
questAlligatorNotes: “Crikey!” exclaims @gully. “An Insta-Gator in its natural habitat! Careful, it distracts its prey with things that seem urgent THIS INSTANT, and it feeds on the unchecked Dailies that result.” You fall silent to avoid attracting its attention, but to no avail. The Insta-Gator spots you and charges! Distracting voices rise up from Swamps of Stagnation, grabbing for your attention: “Read this post! See this photo! Pay attention to me THIS INSTANT!” You scramble to mount a counterattack, completing your Dailies and bolstering your good Habits to fight off the dreaded Insta-Gator.
questAlligatorCompletion: With your attention focused on what’s important and not the Insta-Gator’s distractions, the Insta-Gator flees. Victory! “Are those eggs? They look like gator eggs to me,” asks @mfonda. “If we care for them correctly, they’ll be loyal pets or faithful steeds,” answers @UncommonCriminal, handing you three to care for. Let’s hope so, or else the Insta-Gator might make a return…
questAlligatorUnlockText: Unlocks Alligat'r Eggs fer purchase in th' Market
oddballsNotes: Contains 'Th' Jelly Regent,' 'Escape th' Cave Creature,' an' 'A Tangl'd Yarn.' Available 'til April 30.
birdBuddiesNotes: Contains 'The Fowl Frost,' 'Roost'r Rampage,' and 'The Push-and-Pull Peacock.' Available until December 31.
questVelociraptorNotes:
You’re sharing honey cakes with @*~Seraphina~*, @Procyon P, and @Lilith of Alfheim by a lake in the Stoïkalm Steppes. Suddenly, a mournful voice interrupts your picnic.

My Habits took a hit, I missed my Dailies,
I’m losing it, sinking with doubt and maybes,
At the top of my game I used to be so fly,
But now I just let my Due Dates go by.

@*~Seraphina~* peers behind a stand of grass. “It’s the Veloci-Rapper. It seems... distraught?”

You pump a fist in determination. “There's only one thing to do. Rap battle time!”
questVelociraptorCompletion:
Ye burst through th' grass, confrontin' th' Veloci-Rapp'r.

See here, rapp'r, ye’re no quitt'r,
Ye’re Bad Habits' hardest hitt'r!
Check off yer T' Do's like a boss,
Don’t mourn o'er one day’s loss!

Fill'd wit' renew'd confidence, it bounds off t' freestyle anoth'r day, leavin' behind three eggs where it sat.
questVelociraptorUnlockText: Unlocks Velociraptor Eggs fer purchase in th' Market
mythicalMarvelsNotes: Contains 'Convincin' th' Unicorn Queen,' 'Th' Fiery Gryph'n,' 'n 'Danger in th' Depths: Sea Serp'nt Strike!' Available 'til February 28.
questSilverUnlockText: Unlocks Silver Hatchin' Potions fer plunder in th' Market
questSilverNotes:
Th' recent discov'ry o' Bronze Hatchin' Potions has all o' Habitica natterin'. Could potions o' even brighter metals be possible? Ye head t' Habit City's central Public Library, accomp'nied by @QuartzFox n' @starsystemic, an' gather up great armloads o' books on alchemy t' study.

Aft hours o' eye-strainin' labor, @QuartzFox lets out a not-quite-library-commandeer shout o' triumph. "Aha! I've found it!" Ye hurry o'er t' see. "A Silver Hatchin' Potion can be made wit' runes o' th' zodee-ac sign Cancer, dissolved in pure silver melted o'er flame infused wit' th' power o' Moon runes."

"We'll needs a lot o' those ingredients," muses @starsystemic. "In case an attempt goes wrong."

"Thar's only one place t' find huge quana-tees o' such random craftin' materials," says @Edge, standin' in th' shadow o' th' stacks wit' arms cross't. 'Ave they been thar th' whole time? "Th' Dungeons o' Drudgery. Let's get goin'."
questSilverCompletion:
Ye've delved. Ye've dredged. Ye've scavenged. At last ye emerge from th' Dungeons, laden wit' runes n' bars o' silver, covered in sludge but exil'rated wit' success. Ye journey back t' Habit City n' set t' work in an alchemy lab. Ye an' @starsystemic follow th' formulas @QuartzFox found, under th' careful supervision o' @Edge. Finally, in a great puff o' glitter n' smoke, yer concoction settles inta th' familiar vis-costy o' a Hatchin' Potion!

@Edge scoops th' mixture into vials n' grins. "Let's give it a try, shall we? Anyone got 'ny Eggs?"

Ye rush t' th' Stables, wonderin' wha' shinin' secrets may yet remain undiscovered...
questDolphinUnlockText: Unlocks Dolph'n Eggs fer plunder in th' Market
questDolphinNotes:
Ye walk upon th' shores o' Inkomplete Bay, ponderin' th' dauntin' work ahead o' ye. A splash in th' water catches yer eye. A magnificent dolph'n arcs o'er th' waves. Sunlight glimmers off its fins n' tail. But wait...tha's not sunlight, an' th' dolph'n doesn't dip back inta th' sea. It fixes its gaze on @khdarkwolf.

"I'll ne'er finish all these Dailies," said @khdarkwolf.

"I'm not good enough t' reach me goals," said @confusedcicada as th' dolph'n turned its glare on 'em.

"Why did I even bother tryin'?" asked @mewrose, witherin' under th' stare o' th' beast.

Its eyes meet yers, an' feel yer mind begin t' sink under th' risin' tide o' doubt. Ye steel yerself; someone has t' defeat this creature, an' it's goin' t' be ye!
questDolphinCompletion:
Yer battle o' wills wit' th' dolph'n has left ye tired but victorious. Wit' yer determination an' encouragement, @mewrose, @khdarkwolf, an' @confusedcicada pick 'emselves up an' shake off th' dolph'n's insidious telepathy. Th' four o' ye shield yerselves wit' a sense o' accomplishment in yer constist'nt Dailies, strong Habits, an' completed T' Do's 'til it closes its glowin' eyes in silent acknowledgement o' yer successes. Wit' that, it tumbles back int' th' bay. As ye trade high-fives an' congratulations, ye notice three eggs wash ashore.

"Hm, I wonder wha' we can do wit' those," @khdarkwolf muses.
questBronzeUnlockText: Unlocks Bronze Hatchin' Potions fer plunder in th' Market
questBronzeCompletion: "Well met, warrior!" says th' beetle as she settles t' th' ground. Be she smilin'? 'Tis hard t' tell from those mandibles. "Ye've truly earned these potions!""Blimey, we've ne'er gotten a reward like this fer winnin' a battle afore!" says @UncommonCriminal, turnin' a shimmerin' bottle in their hand. "Weigh anchor and hoist the mizzen! Let's go hatch our new pets!"
questBronzeNotes:
On a refreshin' break 'tween tasks, ye and some mateys take a stroll through th' forest trails o' th' Taskwoods. Ye come upon a large hollow log an' a sparkle from inside catches yer attention.

Why, 'tis a tresure chest o' Magic Hatchin' Potions! Th' shimmerin' bronze liquid swirls gently in th' bottles, an' @Hachiseiko reaches t' pick one up t' examine it.

"Avast ye!" hisses a voice fr'm behind ye. 'Tis a gigantic beetle wit' a coatin' o' gleamin' bronze, raisin' her clawed feet in a fightin' stance. "Those are me potions, an' if ye wish t' earn 'em, ye must send me to Davy Jones' Locker!"
rockingReptilesNotes: Contains 'The Insta-Gator,' 'The Serpent o' Distraction,' an' 'The Veloci-Rapper.' Available until September 30.
questRobotUnlockText: Unlocks purchasable Robot Eggs in th' Market
questRobotCompletion: As @Rev an' th' Accountability Buddy place th' last bolt in place, th' time machine buzzes t' life. @FolleMente an' @McCoyly jump aboard. “Thanks fer th' assist! We’ll see ye in th' future! By the way, these should 'elp ye wit' yer next invention!” Wit' that, th' time travelers disappear, but left behind in th' wreckage o' th' ol' Productivity Stabilizer be three clockwork eggs. Perhaps these 'll be th' crucial components fer a new production line o' Accountability Buddies!
questRobotNotes:
At Max Capacity labs, @Rev be puttin' the finishin' touches on thar newest invention, a robotic Accountability Buddy, when a strange metal vehicle suddenly appears in a plume o' smoke, inches from th' robot’s Fluctuation Detector! Its occupants, two strange figures dressed in silver, emerge an' remove their space helmets, revealing 'emselves as @FolleMente and @McCoyly.

“I hypothesize that thar was an anomaly in our productivity implementation,” @FolleMente says sheepishly.

@McCoyly crosses her arms. “That means they neglected to complete thar Dailies, which I postulate led t' th' disintegration o' our Productivity Stabilizer. It’s an essential component t' time travel that needs consistency to work properly. Our accomplishments power our movement through time an' space! I don’t 'ave time t' explain further, @Rev. Ye’ll discover it in 37 years, or perhaps yer allies th' Mysterious Time Travel'rs kin fill ye in. For now, kin ye 'elp us fix our time machine?”
questAmberUnlockText: Unlocks Amber Hatchin' Potions fer purchase in th' Market
questAmberCompletion:
“Trerezin?” @-Tyr- says calmly. “Could ye let @Vikte go? I don’t think they’re enjoyin' being so high up.”

Th' Trerezin’s amber skin blushes crimson and she gently lowers @Vikte t' th' ground. “My apologies! It’s been so long since I’ve had any guests that I’ve forgotten my manners!” She slithers forward t' greet ye properly before disappearin' into her treehouse, an' returnin' wit' an armful o' Amber Hatchin' Potions as thank-ye gifts!

“Magic Potions!” @Vikte gasps.

“Oh, these old things?” The Trerezin's tongue flickers as she thinks. “How about this? I’ll give you this whole stack if ye promise t' visit me every so often...”

And so ye leave th' Taskwoods, excited t' tell ev'ryone about th' new potions--an' yer new friend!
questAmberNotes:
Yer sittin' in th' Tavern wit' @beffymaroo an' @-Tyr- when @Vikte bursts through th' door an' excitedly tells ye about th' rumors o' another type o' Magic Hatchin' Potion hidden in th' Taskwoods. Havin' complet'd yer Dailies, th' three o' ye immediately agree t' help @Vikte on their search. After all, what’s th' harm in a little adventure?

After walkin' through th' Taskwoods fer hours, yer beginnin' t' regret joinin' such a wild chase. Ye're about t' head home, when ye hear a surpris'd yelp an' turn t' see a huge lizard wit' shiny amber scales coil'd 'round a tree, clutchin' @Vikte in her claws. @beffymaroo reaches fer her sword.

“Wait!” cries @-Tyr-. “It’s th' Trerezin! She’s not dangerous, just dangerously clingy!”
delightfulDinosNotes: Contains 'The Pterror-dactyl,' 'The Trampling Triceratops,' an' 'The Dinosaur Unearthed.' Available 'til November 30.
evilSantaAddlNotes: Note that Trapp'r Santa an' Find th' Cub 'ave stackable adventure medals but give a rare critter an' steed that can only be add'd t' yer stable once.
questRubyCompletion:
Wit' th' necessary items safely packed away, th' three o' ye rush back t' Habit City an' meet in @beffymaroo's lab. “Excellent work!” @beffymaroo says. “Ye've gathered th' ingredients fer th' potion!”

@beffymaroo carefully combines th' runes an' th' rubies t' create a brilliant red potion an' pours some o' it on two pet eggs. As ye observe th' results, ye notice that th' two pets seem completely uninterested in one another!

“Did it not work?” @gully asks. But before anyone can answer, ye suddenly realize that it isn't th' potion that creates friendship an' love, but rather it be th' experience o' workin' together toward a common goal. Ye come away from th' quest havin' gained some new friends...and some flashy new pets!
questRubyNotes:
Th' normally bustlin' peaks o' th' Stoïkalm Volcanoes lie silent in th' snow. “I suppose th' hikers an' sight-seers are hibernatin'?” @gully says t' ye an' @Aspiring_Advocate. “That makes our search easier.”

As ye reach th' summit, th' chill wind merges wit' th' steam billowin' from th' crater. “There!” @Aspiring_Advocate exclaims, pointin' toward a hot spring. “What better place t' find cool runes o' Aquarius an' passionate runes o' Venus than where ice an' fire meet?”

Th' three o' ye hurry toward th' hot spring. “Accordin' t' my research,” @Aspiring_Advocate says, “combinin' th' runes wit' heart-shaped rubies will create a hatchin' potion that can foster friendship an' love!”

Excited by th' prospect o' a new discovery, ye all smile. “All right,” @gully says, “let's start searchin'!”
questWaffleNotes:
“April Fool!” storms a flustered Lady Glaciate. “Ye said yer dessert-themed prank was ‘over wit' an' completely cleaned up’!”

“Why, it was an' is, my dear,” replies th' Fool, puzzled. “And I am th' most honest o' Fools. What's wrong?”

“There's a giant sugary monster approachin' Habit City!”

“Hmm,” muses th' Fool. “I did raid a few lairs fer th' mystic reagents fer my last event. Maybe I attracted some unwanted attention. Is it th' Saccharine Serpent? Th' Torte-oise? Tiramisu Rex?”

“No! It's some sort of... Awful Waffle!”

“Huh. That's a new one! Perhaps it spawned from all th' ambient shenanigan energy.” He turns t' ye an' @beffymaroo wit' a lopsided smile. “I don't suppose ye'd be available fer some heroics?”
questRubyUnlockText: Unlocks Ruby Hatchin' Potions fer purchase in th' Market
questBlackPearlNotes:
Ye’ve been feelin' uninspir'd lately, so when @jjgame83 suggests a trip t' Lively Lake, ye jump at th' chance fer a change o' scenery. As @QuartzFox lays out a picnic on th' shore, ye find somethin' glintin' in th' shallows. A strange black pearl.

“I wish I had a new idea,” ye sigh.

A chill washes over th' shore. Th' lake turns t' black ink. Th' stars rise as noon becomes midnight in a heartbeat.

“Those aren’t good signs,” says @PixelStormArt.

A towerin' mass o' arms bursts from th' lake in a spray o' foam, an' from its beak, it booms: “BEHOLD ASTEROIDEA, THE IDEA FROM BEYOND THE STARS!”

A tentacle slams down onto th' picnic basket. Good idea or not, ye leap into action.
sandySidekicksNotes: Contains 'Th' Indulgent Armadillo', 'Th' Serpent o' Distraction', an' 'Th' Icy Arachnid'. Available 'til <%= date %>.
questTurquoiseUnlockText: Unlocks Turquoise Hatchin' Potions fer purchase in th' Market
questTurquoiseCompletion:
Hot an' sweaty, yer team finally stops t' rest beside th' upturn'd dirt an' looks at th' pile o' runes an' gems ye’ve found.

“Unbelievable,” murmurs @QuartzFox. “This will rewrite th' history books.”

“Let me take these materials back t' Habitica University fer analysis,” says @gawrone. “There should be plenty t' study an' t' make some turquoise potions fer all o' us! Who knows what else we could find buri'd around here?”

@starsystemic chimes in: “It’s amazin' how much ye can git accomplish'd wit' some hard work!”
questTurquoiseNotes:
@gawrone runs into yer room holdin' their Habitican Diploma in one hand an' an extraordinarily large an' dusty leather-bound tome in th' other.

“Ye’ll never guess what I’ve discovered!” they say. “Th' reason th' Flourishin' Fields are so fertile be that they were once cover'd wit' a vast ocean. It’s rumor'd that an ancient people once inhabit'd that ocean floor in enchant'd cities. I’ve used fergotten maps t' find th' most likely location! Get yer shovel!”

Th' next evenin' ye meet up, @QuartzFox an' @starsystemic joinin' th' party, an' begin t' dig. Deep in th' ground ye find a rune, wit' a turquoise gem nearby!

“Keep diggin'!” @gawrone urges. “If we find enough, we can make one o' their ancient potions an' history at th' same time!”
questWindupUnlockText: Unlocks Wind-Up Hatchin' Potions fer purchase in th' Market
questWindupCompletion:
As ye dodge th' attacks, ye notice somethin' odd: a stripy brass tail stickin' out o' th' robot’s chassis. Ye plunge a hand amid th' grindin' gears an' pull out… a tremblin' wind-up tiger cub. It snuggles against yer shirt.

Th' clockwork robot immediately stops flailin' an' smiles, its cogs clickin' back into place. “Ki-Ki-Kitty! Kitty got in me!”

“Great!” th' Powerful says, blushin'. “I’ve been workin' hard on these wind-up pet potions. I guess I lost track o' my new creations. I’ve been missin' my ‘Tidy th' workshop’ daily a lot lately…”

Ye follow th' tinkerer an' Clankton inside. Parts, tools an' potions cover ev'ry surface. “Powerful” takes yer watch, but hands ye a few potions.

“Take these. Clearly they’ll be safer wit' ye!”
questWindupNotes:
Habit City be seldom quiet, but ye weren’t prepar'd fer th' cacophony o' creaks, squeaks an' screams escapin' Good Timekeepin', Habitica’s finest clockwork emporium. Ye sigh--you just want'd yer watch fixed. Th' proprietor, known only as “Great an' Powerful”, tumbles out th' door, pursu'd by a clankin' copper colossus!

“Ki-! Ki-! Ki!” it clangs, arms smashin' up an' down. Its gears grind an' screech in protest.

“My robot Clankton has gone mad! It’s tryin' t' kill me!” th' supposedly Powerful one shrieks.

Even wit' a broken watch, ye can tell when it’s time t' fight. Ye leap forward t' defend th' panickin' watchmaker. @Vikte an' @a_diamond also step up t' help!

“Ki-! Ki-! Ki-!” Clankton chants wit' each blow. “Mew!”

Wait, was that mechanical mewlin' amidst th' murderous monotone?
questWindupText: A Whirl wit' a Wind-Up Warrior
questFluoriteUnlockText: Unlocks Fluorite Hatchin' Potions fer purchase in th' Market
questFluoriteCompletion:
As ye do battle, th' crystal creature seems more an' more distracted by th' light show ye are creatin'. “So shiny…” it mutters.

“Of course!” @nirbhao exclaims. “It must be a fluorite elemental. All they want be light t' let 'em glow. Let’s help it shine.”

Th' elemental giggles happily an' glows all th' brighter as ye light up torches an' motes o' magic. It’s so glad t' be shinin' again that it leads ye t' a rich deposit o' fluorite crystals.

“This be th' perfect ingredient fer a new hatchin' potion,” says @nirbhao. “One which will make our pets as bright as our new fluorescent friend.”
questFluoriteNotes:
Unusual minerals are in high demand these days, so ye an' a few friends have trekked deep into th' mines o' th' Meanderin' Mountains, in search o' excitin' ores. It’s a long an' borin' expedition, 'til @-Tyr- stumbles over a large rock, sittin' right in th' middle o' th' tunnel.

“This should help brighten things up,” says @nirbhao, before conjurin' up an orb o' light.

A warm brightness fills th' tunnel, but somethin' odd starts happenin' t' that large rock. Feedin' on th' magical light, it begins t' glow wit' fluorescent blues, greens an' purples. Then it rears upright into a vaguely humanoid shape, complete wit' glowin' red eyes fixed right on ye! Ye jump into action wit' flashin' spells an' shinin' weapons.
questWaffleUnlockText: Unlocks Confection Hatchin' Potions fer purchase in th' Market
questWaffleRageEffect: `Awful Waffle uses MAPLE MIRE!` Sticky sappy syrup slows yer swings an' spells!
questWaffleRageDescription: Maple Mire: This bar fills when ye don't complete yer Dailies. When it be full, th' Awful Waffle will set back th' crew's attack progress!
questWaffleCompletion:
Batter'd an' butter'd but triumphant, ye savor sweet victory as th' Awful Waffle collapses into a pool o' sticky goo.

“Wow, ye really cream'd that monster,” says Lady Glaciate, impressed.

“A piece o' cake!” beams th' April Fool.

“Kind o' a shame, though,” says @beffymaroo. “It looked good enough t' eat.”

Th' Fool takes a set o' potion bottles from somewhere in his cape, fills them wit' th' syrupy leavings o' th' Waffle, an' mixes in a pinch o' sparklin' dust. Th' liquid swirls wit' color--new Hatchin' Potions! He tosses them into yer arms. “All that adventure has given me an appetite. Who wants t' join me fer breakfast?”
questWaffleText: Wafflin' wit' th' Fool: Disaster Breakfast!
questBlackPearlUnlockText: Unlocks Black Pearl Hatchin' Potions fer purchase in th' Market
jungleBuddiesNotes: Contains 'Monstrous Mandrill an' th' Mischief Monkeys', 'Th' Somnolent Sloth', an' 'Th' Tangle Tree'. Available 'til <%= date %>.
questBlackPearlCompletion:
As ye batt'r an' blast th' beastie, it sheds black pearls across th' sands. Their glistening surfaces catch yer eye as ye dodge another smashing tentacle.

Ye may be in mortal peril, but ye can’t help thinkin' o' how beautifully they glimm'r. Then ye can’t help thinkin' that this be a terrible time fer a new potion idea.

Suddenly th' monster freezes. @jjgame83 an' @PixelStormArt exchange baffl'd looks an' lower their weapons.

“YE HAVE YER WISH, MORTAL. MY WORK BE DONE.”

Asteroidea vanishes, an' th' sky an' waters clear. @QuartzFox stares at ye. “Care t' explain?”

Ye try yer best, an' together ye fill th' picnic basket wit' black pearls. An afternoon o' alchemy later, ye have t' admit it was a pretty good idea.
questStoneUnlockText: Unlocks Mossy Stone Hatchin' Potions fer purchase in th' Market
questStoneNotes:
Ye open th' gates t' th' Fortress o' Neglect only t' be surpris'd by th' moss that has grown all o'er th' statues, rocks an' surfaces in th' garden. “Oh no, th' garden has been neglect'd fer too long!” says @jjgame83.

“Well, it's never too late t' start tendin' t' th' garden,” @PixelStormArt says enthusiastically, “but where shall we start tacklin' th' maze o' moss?”

“We can make an' follow a plan so we don't git lost,” says @QuartzFox.

While clearin' away th' mossy rocks, @starsystemic spots Mars an' Capricorn runes hidd'n underneath. “What be these fer? Let's take 'em back t' th' Habit City Library t' look 'em up when we're finish'd.”

That's assumin' ye find yer way back out o' here at all, ye think, but don't say aloud.
questStoneCompletion:
Th' work clearin' o'ergrowth an' movin' loose stones taxes ye t' th' limits o' yer strength. But ye divide th' work among th' team, an' place stones in th' paths behind ye t' help ye find yer way back t' th' others. Th' runes ye find bolster yer strength an' determination, too, an' in th' end th' garden don't look so neglect'd at all!

Ye convene at th' Library as @starsystemic suggest'd, an' find a Magic Potion formula that uses th' runes ye collect'd. “This be an unexpect'd reward fer attendin' t' our neglect'd tasks,” says @jjgame83.

@QuartzFox agrees, “And that be on top o' havin' a beautiful garden t' enjoy wit' our critters.”

“Let's start makin' some a-mazin' Mossy Stone Hatchin' Potions!” says @starsystemic, an' ev'ryone joins in happily.
